views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10.

Brings 3D touch app shortcuts on homescreen to older devices.

Configure options from Settings.

Fix memory leak on preference change - Fixed going into editing mode instead of app shortcuts menu when press duration is bigger than ~0.66 - Increased range for haptic feedback intensity
- Fixed gestures sometimes not being registered the first time homescreen is invoked
- Improved selecting/dragging icons while in editing mode
- Fixed app shortcuts being invoked when finger moved outside of icon
- Added option to Auto Dismiss shortcuts menu (Enabled by default).
